thread.title: RFID Signal Safe Launches New Passport and Credit Card Protective Sleeves
thread.title_full: RFID Signal Safe Launches New Passport and Credit Card Protective Sleeves

title: RFID Signal Safe Launches New Passport and Credit Card Protective Sleeves
text:
October 22, 2015 at 17:54 PM EDT RFID Signal Safe Launches New Passport and Credit Card Protective Sleeves 
23rd October, 2015 - RFID Signal Safe, a trusted name in identity theft protection products recently announced the launch of the company’s brand new line of passport and credit card protective sleeves on their website and on Amazon.com at a discounted price to protect against cases of identity theft. 
The credit card protectors are exclusively suited for those who travel frequently and are perfect for tourists, office goers and long distance commuters. Given that identity theft is a rapidly rising menace, RFID Signal Safe’s meticulously designed credit card protectors promise to keep the client’s private details and financial information safe from electronic pickpockets and the like. Also, the credit card wallet has a dual use as the sleeves are capable of protecting the magnetic strips from scratches or demagnetization, and thus is a highly useful and efficient purchase. 
The credit card protector, RFID Signal Safe’s foolproof solution to the identity theft problem, has been created keeping in mind the average needs of the workaholic citizen, and as such, has 10 credit card sleeves and two passport sleeves. It is seamlessly designed and fits comfortably inside a wallet’s credit card slot. 
Furthermore, an authentic Made in America product, the credit card protector has been launched at a highly discounted price on their website and on Amazon.com. Finally, RFID Signal Safe promises that not only does the card protector effectively protects against identify theft by preventing unauthorized scans of one’s personal information, the product also keeps one’s credit cards absolutely clean, thereby providing a dual function. Thus, it is an ideal gift for anyone who enjoys or requires travelling very frequently. 
The credit card protector is compatible with almost all the different types of credit cards currently available and in use in the market, and includes (but is not limited to) Government Personal Identity Verification cards such as the Linc-Pass or the FlexSmart options, all cards that are compatible with DESFire and MIFARE ®, Transporter Worker Identification Credential, transit cards, enhanced driver’s licenses, European Squid Cards, Military Common Access cards, the newer varieties of contactless credit cards as well as several US Passport cards. In short, RFID Signal Safe’s new credit card protector to counter identity theft is perfectly compatible with all contactless that can operate at frequencies of that operate at 13.56MHz or more. 
Interested customers may purchase RFID Signal Safe’s latest offering, the credit card protector at a discounted price on their website at www.rfidsignalsafe.com or on Amazon.com at http://www.amazon.com/dp/B013O26Y46 
For more information regarding the credit card protectors or RFID Signal Safe or any of the company’s latest updates and products, please feel free to contact Nick Cocchiola at mentioned contacts below.
